file_content.text: Well. I've seen some incredible things in my time, but you've just topped the list.
I'm sorry I couldn't greet you in person--if only you had let me know you were stopping by.
Your taunts are useless. This won't stop until the Esseles is free.
Give it up, Kilran.
If this is a bad time, we could come back later.
Are we inconveniencing you?
Oh, no. Not at all. I assure you, I'm quite prepared for your visit.
We didn't come here to chat, Kilran.
Talk, talk, talk.
You sadden me. I can only be cordial through so much.
My men will be along shortly to escort you to the accommodations I've arranged.
Your men can't stop us, Kilran.
Recommend whatever you want.
You greatly overestimate your chances.
I guess this is where the fun begins.
Here we go again.
I'll just be going now.
No, no. You aren't going anywhere.
Ironfist wasn't the only weapon in my arsenal--nor the deadliest.
See you soon.
I hope you realize that this is getting out of hand. You're leaving me with precious few options.
I don't want to do anything drastic. But I will. Surrender--now.
Very well. You give me no other choice.
I'm charging up our main turbolaser batteries. In a few moments, your pathetic ship and all of your pathetic friends will be nothing but floating debris.
I'll enjoy watching you try.
It's really not up to you, I'm afraid.
Forget about him!
We'd better get the engines, too, or he'll just run us down again. Come on!
We'll never make it in time.
I hope you realize that this is getting out of hand. You're leaving me with precious few options.
I don't want to do anything drastic. But I will. Surrender--now.
Just give it up. We're leaving, and you can't stop us.
It's over, Kilran.
I can. And I will.
You're all talk.
Very well. You give me no other choice.
Why don't we settle this in person, Kilran? You know where we are.
Face me yourself, coward.
I have more efficient plans.
I'm charging up our main turbolaser batteries. In a few moments, your pathetic ship and all of your pathetic friends will be nothing but floating debris.
I'm not going to let you kill those people, Kilran!
No!
Let's run for it!
Time to go.
Feel free to try.
Someday, I'm going to find you, I'm going to kill you, and I'm going to enjoy it.
We'll meet again, Kilran.
I'll enjoy watching you try.
Listen, we've got to shut down those turbolasers, or the Esseles is done for.
